comprehensive_overview: Hierarchical Data Format Version 4 (HDF4) is a data management software library and file format that provides high-performance I/O capabilities for storing and managing large and complex data. HDF4 is designed to support diverse data types and structures, enabling efficient data storage, retrieval, and sharing.
core_features:
1. Support for various data types and structures
2. High-performance I/O operations
3. Scalable and flexible data storage
4. Tools for data visualization and manipulation
5. Support for parallel and distributed computing
6. Cross-platform compatibility
